item.title: 他们认为自己最平庸的想法都是绝妙的，忽略了自己正在挣扎的迹象，把纠正当成建议。
item.description:
They think their most banal ideas are brilliant, ignore signs that they’re struggling and treat corrections like suggestions.

Your co-worker is lousy—and doesn’t even know it. https://t.co/mlbEmGHM4w https://t.co/mlbEmGHM4w

item.title: 跳过平庸的手表吧，伙计们。这六款酷炫奇特的手表，包括全黑款和史蒂夫-麦奎因（Steve McQueen）钟爱的方形款式，一定会让你眼前一亮，引来赞美之词。
item.description:
Skip the predictable watches, guys. These six coolly quirky models—including all-black takes and a square style favored by Steve McQueen—will turn heads and draw compliments. https://t.co/3EhtlKKSjI https://t.co/3EhtlKKSjI

— The Wall Street Journal (@WSJ) March 17, 2024

item.title: 一个多世纪以来，社会一直认为反社会病症是不可治疗和不可救赎的。经过多年的研究和深入治疗，我可以说反社会者并不 "坏"、"邪恶 "或 "疯狂"。我们的行为是为了填补空虚，帕特里克-加涅写道。
item.description:
For more than a century, society has deemed sociopathy untreatable and unredeemable. After years of study and intensive therapy, I can say that sociopaths aren’t “bad” or “evil” or “crazy.” We act out to fill a void, writes Patric Gagne. https://t.co/705PVYlgfO pic.twitter.com/6HOKGI1czz

— The Wall Street Journal (@WSJ) March 17, 2024

item.title: 一对夫妇买下了自家后院不远处的一栋破旧楼房，至今已有多年。他们意识到，如果再拖延下去，这栋楼就会倒塌。
item.description:
It has been years since one couple purchased a dilapidated building just beyond their backyard. Finally they set to work, aware that if they delayed much longer it could simply fall down. https://t.co/fF5k4DkaWI https://t.co/fF5k4DkaWI

item.title: 航空公司首席执行官迈克尔-奥利里（Michael O'Leary）今年有望获得 1 亿多美元的奖金。F 炸弹、出言不逊的笑话和醉醺醺的晚餐都是他的口头禅。
item.description:
